content: Super basic question: When working with lean4 in vscode, if I make a change in file A, and file B imports file A, B doesn't seem to see those changes right away. Restarting vscode fixes it, but I'm assuming there is a simpler and faster way to sync A and B up.
You can refresh the imports (Ctrl+shift+x if I recall correctly)
Felix Weilacher has marked this topic as resolved.
